title: Difficult Matter Dua
description: Authentic supplications for Difficult Matter Dua
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Difficult Matter Dua. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 139
items.arabic: ((اللَّهُمَّ لاَ سَهْلَ إِلاَّ مَا جَعَلْتَهُ سَهْلاً، وَأَنْتَ تَجْعَلُ الْحَزْنَ إِذَا شِئْتَ سَهْلاً)).
